articles.description: He’s launching off with Jeff Bezos’s Blue Origin rocket company next week.
articles.content: Maybe he got tired of showing up on Yes Instagram? Pete Davidson and Kim Kardashian will briefly enter a long-distance relationship next week because, per the New York Times, Davidson is scheduled to… [+888 chars]

articles.title: Discovery CEO David Zaslav’s 2021 Pay Package Soars to $246M Ahead of WarnerMedia Merger - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The value of Discovery Inc. CEO David Zaslav’s 2021 compensation package soared to $246 million, an enormous jump compared with $37.7 million in 2020 and $45.8 million in 2019. The company disclosed the compensation for Zaslav and other senior executives in a…
